Marketing Executive Job at Synergy Structure and Shelters Limited




        
    

        
        Synergy Structure and Shelters Limited, a real estate company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Executive

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	Our Real Estate & PropTech company is seeking a creative, strategic, and results-driven Marketing Executive with a minimum of 3 years relevant experience.
	The ideal candidate should be proactive, organised, and capable of driving brand visibility, customer engagement, and marketing growth in a fast-paced, tech-driven environment.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Develop and execute marketing strategies and campaigns across digital and traditional channels.
	Manage social media platforms, content creation, and online engagement to strengthen brand presence.
	Conduct market research to identify trends, customer insights, and opportunities for growth.
	Plan and coordinate promotional activities, events, and brand initiatives.
	Monitor, analyse, and report on campaign performance using marketing analytics tools.
	Collaborate with sales and product teams to drive lead generation and conversion.
	Ensure consistent brand messaging across all platforms and marketing materials.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications.
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in marketing, digital marketing, brand management, or a similar role.
	Strong knowledge of marketing strategies, content development, and analytics tools.
	Proficiency in digital marketing software (e.g., Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, Canva, CRM platforms, or similar).
	Excellent creativity, communication, analytical, and organisational skills.
	Experience in real estate or PropTech is an added advantage.
